sourcesContent:
import Koa from 'koa'
import cors from '@koa/cors'
import logger from 'koa-logger'
import parser from 'koa-body'
import router from './router'
import initDatabase from './db'

const app = new Koa()

initDatabase()

app.use(cors())
app.use(logger())
app.use(parser())
app.use(router())

app.listen(8000)

import compose from 'koa-compose'
import Articles from './contexts/articles'
import Datasets from './contexts/datasets'
import Events from './contexts/events'
import Papers from './contexts/papers'
import Projects from './contexts/projects'

const Router = compose([
  Articles.routes(), 
  Datasets.routes(),
  Events.routes(),
  Papers.routes(),
  Projects.routes()
])

export default Router

import compose from 'koa-compose'
import Articles from './contexts/articles'
import Datasets from './contexts/datasets'
import Events from './contexts/events'
import Papers from './contexts/papers'
import Projects from './contexts/projects'
import Videos from './contexts/videos'
import Feed from './feed'

const Router = () => { 
  return compose([
    Articles.routes(), 
    Datasets.routes(),
    Events.routes(),
    Papers.routes(),
    Projects.routes(),
    Videos.routes(),
    Feed.routes()
  ])
}

export default Router

import mongoose from 'mongoose'

const initDatabase = () => {
  mongoose.connect('mongodb://127.0.0.1:27017/test', {useNewUrlParser: true})

  mongoose.connection
    .on('error', (error) => console.log(error))
    .on('close', () => console.log('Database closed'))
    .once('open', () => console.log('Database opened'))
}

export default initDatabase

import Koa from 'koa'
import cors from '@koa/cors'
import logger from 'koa-logger'
import parser from 'koa-body'
import router from './router'
import initDatabase from './db'

const app = new Koa()

initDatabase()

app.use(cors())
app.use(logger())
app.use(parser())
app.use(router())

app.listen(8000)

import compose from 'koa-compose'
import Articles from './contexts/articles'
import Datasets from './contexts/datasets'
import Papers from './contexts/papers'
import Projects from './contexts/projects'
import Videos from './contexts/videos'
import Feed from './feed'

const Router = () => { 
  return compose([
    Articles.routes(), 
    Datasets.routes(),
    Papers.routes(),
    Projects.routes(),
    Videos.routes(),
    Feed.routes()
  ])
}

export default Router
